todos.content: Analyze current architecture - read key sandbox, tool, and prompt files
Design KV cache schema and taxonomy (scopes, TTLs, security model)
Implement core kv_store.py service layer with async CRUD operations
Extract current prompt into modular instruction files
Refactor prompt builder to use file references instead of inline content
Integrate KV cache tool into ToolManager registration
Add instruction seeding mechanism and lifecycle management
Implement observability (logging, metrics) and security controls
Update REST API endpoints for cache browsing and management
